mapper.insert: insert into rewandpun (money, time, year, month, cause, employeeid) values (#{money},#{time},#{year},#{month},#{cause},#{employeeId});
mapper.update: update rewandpun set money = #{money},time=#{time},year=#{year},month=#{month},cause=#{cause},employeeId=#{employeeId} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from rewandpun where employeeid=#{employeeId} and time=#{time};
